Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '???', 3: '"The princess gradually grew older. Just as the witches blessed her, she grew into a beautiful, intelligent, and gentle girl."'}

{2: '???', 3: '"On the day of her 15th birthday, the princess visited an ancient tower deep within the castle. It seemed as if she was guided by an incredible power. She climbed the tower and reached the room at the top."'}
{2: '???', 3: '"In the middle of the room stood a spinning wheel that should\'ve long since been burned by the king. A strange old woman was spinning with a spindle. "'}
{2: '???', 3: '"Hi, ma\'am. What are you doing?"'}
{2: '???', 3: '"I\'m spinning thread. Take a look. What do you think? Would a cute little girl such as yourself like to try?"'}
{2: '???', 3: '"The old lady tricked the naive princess, and put her hand on the spindle..."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory53.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'Perfect compatibility with the... copolymers... Success rate for the modification... very high.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: '...However, these subjects are in very poor health and have serious traumatic stress disorder.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: 'Humanoid-hybrid Constructs are different from normal Constructs. The former is more effective in combat, but this seriously impacts the stability of their consciousness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: "If the subject is modified while their consciousness is unstable, I'm afraid...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Officer', 3: 'Then give them some time, especially "her."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Officer', 3: "It's not easy to find such a perfect test subject. We must ensure it goes well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Officer', 3: 'Talk with her again once she wakes up...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Officer', 3: '...You know what to say.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory69.jpg'}
{3: 'When I opened my eyes, I saw a ghastly white light.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "You're awake.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A woman wearing a mask and a lab coat appeared before me. She gently put her hand on my forehead, and I could smell the soft aroma of her disinfectant.'}
{3: "Unable to speak, I could only reach out and grab the women's clothes."}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'This is the ARUs scientific research institution, "Niflheim". It now also functions as a care facility.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "I'm... the doctor responsible for taking care of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "Captain Pfaff rescued you. Don't you remember? Don't worry, you and your comrades are safe.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'Everything is okay now. Get well soon.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "...Where's my daddy?"}
{3: "I must have sounded hoarse and frightened... The white-clad woman's eyes showed a look of pity."}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: 'The armed forces have gone to search for survivors, but unfortunately, your father has not been found yet.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Female Researcher', 3: "You're in rough shape. You'll need to take it easy for now.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Since then, I have been locked up in this "ward".'}
{3: 'Painful groans and sad wails could be heard throughout the care facility each day, as if they were being tortured.'}
{3: 'When I asked about the screams to the female doctor who came to check on me, she only says that the refugees who sustained burns are changing their dressings.'}
{3: 'Does it really... hurt that bad?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory69.jpg'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: '...Constructs?'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Male Researcher', 3: 'Correct. If you become a "Construct", you can get rid of your sick body, and you\'ll never ever get sick again. Also, you\'ll be a hundred times stronger than a regular person.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: 'Once you complete all your missions assigned by the ARU, you can go anywhere you want.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: "And, of course, you can also go look for your father. After all... We haven't found his body yet. It's always good to have some hope.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: '...One more thing.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: 'If you agree to become a Construct, I guarantee that the people of Soltvara will receive the best treatment. When the Punishing Virus is vanquished, the ARU will find a suitable place for them to live.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: "They'll have somewhere to start a new life, rather than be homeless.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: "Isn't this what your father would have wanted?", 4: '1'}
{3: '...Is this my "atonement?"'}
{2: 'Male Researcher', 3: 'So? What is your decision?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'I agree... to becoming a Construct.'}
